column4: does ubuntu have a way to make the wallpaper cycle periodically on its own?
sounds like that would be fairly easy to do with cron.
I suppose... it would be nice if there was a GUI option though. I don't feel like setting up a cron tab right now, lol
I just found a utility for Gnome, it sits in the panel notification area and sets a random wallpaper at login, or on a regular basis (or on demand)
